source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_dpia_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_dpia_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_dpia_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSDPIAID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                                     AS IMSDPIAID, -- surrogate key
    'No Info'	AS	DPIAIDLegacy,
    'No Info'	AS	DPIAIDCoded,
    T1.name	AS	DPIAName,
    T1.assigned_user_id	AS	DPIAAssignedUserID,
    T1.assigned_user_name	AS	DPIAAssignedUserName,
    T1.ims_dpia_number	AS	IMSDPIANumber,
    T1.pm_c	AS	DPIAPM,
    T1.contract_owner_c	AS	DPIAContractOwner,
    T1.organisation_areas_c	AS	DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    T1.link_draft_dpia_c	AS	DPIALinkDraft,
    T1.date_registered_c	AS	DPIADateRegistered,
    T1.date_to_mhclg_c	AS	DPIADateToMHCLG,
    T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c	AS	DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c	AS	DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c	AS	DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c	AS	DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    T1.date_dpia_completed_c	AS	DPIADateCompleted,
    T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c	AS	DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c	AS	DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    T1.review_period	AS	DPIAReviewPeriod,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_date	AS	DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    T1.dpia_num_container_c	AS	DPIANumberContainer,
    T1.help	AS	DPIAHelp,
    T1.date_to_sdpm	AS	DPIADateToSDPM,
    T1.residual_risks	AS	DPIAResidualRisks,
    T1.disagreement	AS	DPIADisagreement,
    T1.io_decision_outcome	AS	IODecisionOutcome,
    T1.io_screening_outcome	AS	IOScreeningOutcome,
    T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1	AS	DPIAIMSINtegration,
    T1.document_id_c	AS	DPIADocumentID,
    T1.dpia_controlled_document_c	AS	DPIAControlledDocument,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c	AS	DPIADateNextReview,
    T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c	AS	DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    T1.user_id_c	AS	DPIAUserID,
    T1.information_owner_c	AS	DPIAInformationOwner,
    T1.user_id1_c	AS	DPIAUser1ID,
    T1.information_expert_c	AS	DPIAInformationOwner1,
    T1.status	AS	DPIAStatus,
    T1.date_modified	AS	DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    T1.pers_resp_implementation_c	AS	DPIADateModified,
    T1.securitygroups	AS	SecurityGroups,
    T1.assigned_user_link	AS	DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    T1.created_by	AS	CreatedBy,
    T1.created_by_link	AS	CreatedByLink,
    T1.created_by_name	AS	CreatedByName,
    T1.date_entered	AS	DateEntered,
    T1.deleted	AS	Deleted,
    T1.description	AS	Description,
    T1.modified_by_name	AS	ModifiedByName,
    T1.modified_user_id	AS	ModifiedUserID,
    T1.modified_user_link	AS	ModifiedUserLink,
    T1.priority	AS	DPIAPriority,
    T1.resolution	AS	DPIAResolution,
    T1.type	AS	DPIAType,
    T1.work_log	AS	WorkLog,


    T2.SourceSystemID                                                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                                          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        '.',
        '.',
        IFNULL( T1.name	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_id	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_name	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.ims_dpia_number	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.pm_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.contract_owner_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.organisation_areas_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.link_draft_dpia_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_registered_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_to_mhclg_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_dpia_completed_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.review_period	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.last_current_and_accurate_date	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.dpia_num_container_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.help	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_to_sdpm	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.residual_risks	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.disagreement	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.io_decision_outcome	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.io_screening_outcome	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.document_id_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.dpia_controlled_document_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_of_next_review_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.user_id_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.information_owner_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.user_id1_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.information_expert_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.status	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_modified	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.pers_resp_implementation_c	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.securitygroups	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_link	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.created_by	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.created_by_link	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.created_by_name	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.date_entered	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.deleted	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.description	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.modified_by_name	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.modified_user_id	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.modified_user_link	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.priority	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.resolution	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.type	,'.'),
        IFNULL( T1.work_log	,'.'))) AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                                                     AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                                                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dpia_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim T3 
    ON  T1.dpia_num_container_c = T3.DPIANumberContainer AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.dpia_num_container_c = T3.DPIANumberContainer AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        '.',
                        '.',
                        IFNULL( T1.name	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_id	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_name	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.ims_dpia_number	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.pm_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.contract_owner_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.organisation_areas_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.link_draft_dpia_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_registered_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_to_mhclg_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_dpia_completed_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.review_period	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.last_current_and_accurate_date	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.dpia_num_container_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.help	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_to_sdpm	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.residual_risks	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.disagreement	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.io_decision_outcome	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.io_screening_outcome	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.document_id_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.dpia_controlled_document_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_of_next_review_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.user_id_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.information_owner_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.user_id1_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.information_expert_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.status	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_modified	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.pers_resp_implementation_c	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.securitygroups	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.assigned_user_link	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.created_by	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.created_by_link	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.created_by_name	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.date_entered	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.deleted	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.description	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.modified_by_name	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.modified_user_id	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.modified_user_link	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.priority	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.resolution	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.type	,'.'),
                        IFNULL( T1.work_log	,'.'))) <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.DPIANumberContainer IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.dpia_num_container_c IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dpia_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_dpia_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSDPIAID,
    DPIAIDLegacy,
    DPIAIDCoded,
    DPIAName,
    DPIAAssignedUserID,
    DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IMSDPIANumber,
    DPIAPM,
    DPIAContractOwner,
    DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    DPIALinkDraft,
    DPIADateRegistered,
    DPIADateToMHCLG,
    DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    DPIADateCompleted,
    DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    DPIAReviewPeriod,
    DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    DPIANumberContainer,
    DPIAHelp,
    DPIADateToSDPM,
    DPIAResidualRisks,
    DPIADisagreement,
    IODecisionOutcome,
    IOScreeningOutcome,
    DPIAIMSINtegration,
    DPIADocumentID,
    DPIAControlledDocument,
    DPIADateNextReview,
    DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    DPIAUserID,
    DPIAInformationOwner,
    DPIAUser1ID,
    DPIAInformationOwner1,
    DPIAStatus,
    DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    DPIADateModified,
    SecurityGroups,
    DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    CreatedBy,
    CreatedByLink,
    CreatedByName,
    DateEntered,
    Deleted,
    Description,
    ModifiedByName,
    ModifiedUserID,
    ModifiedUserLink,
    DPIAPriority,
    DPIAResolution,
    DPIAType,
    WorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_dpia_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSDPIAID,
    DPIAIDLegacy,
    DPIAIDCoded,
    DPIAName,
    DPIAAssignedUserID,
    DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IMSDPIANumber,
    DPIAPM,
    DPIAContractOwner,
    DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    DPIALinkDraft,
    DPIADateRegistered,
    DPIADateToMHCLG,
    DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    DPIADateCompleted,
    DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    DPIAReviewPeriod,
    DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    DPIANumberContainer,
    DPIAHelp,
    DPIADateToSDPM,
    DPIAResidualRisks,
    DPIADisagreement,
    IODecisionOutcome,
    IOScreeningOutcome,
    DPIAIMSINtegration,
    DPIADocumentID,
    DPIAControlledDocument,
    DPIADateNextReview,
    DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    DPIAUserID,
    DPIAInformationOwner,
    DPIAUser1ID,
    DPIAInformationOwner1,
    DPIAStatus,
    DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    DPIADateModified,
    SecurityGroups,
    DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    CreatedBy,
    CreatedByLink,
    CreatedByName,
    DateEntered,
    Deleted,
    Description,
    ModifiedByName,
    ModifiedUserID,
    ModifiedUserLink,
    DPIAPriority,
    DPIAResolution,
    DPIAType,
    WorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim
WHERE DPIANumberContainer IN (SELECT DPIANumberContainer FROM ims_dpia_dim_new WHERE IMSDPIAID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_dpia_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSDPIAID,
    DPIAIDLegacy,
    DPIAIDCoded,
    DPIAName,
    DPIAAssignedUserID,
    DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IMSDPIANumber,
    DPIAPM,
    DPIAContractOwner,
    DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    DPIALinkDraft,
    DPIADateRegistered,
    DPIADateToMHCLG,
    DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    DPIADateCompleted,
    DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    DPIAReviewPeriod,
    DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    DPIANumberContainer,
    DPIAHelp,
    DPIADateToSDPM,
    DPIAResidualRisks,
    DPIADisagreement,
    IODecisionOutcome,
    IOScreeningOutcome,
    DPIAIMSINtegration,
    DPIADocumentID,
    DPIAControlledDocument,
    DPIADateNextReview,
    DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    DPIAUserID,
    DPIAInformationOwner,
    DPIAUser1ID,
    DPIAInformationOwner1,
    DPIAStatus,
    DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    DPIADateModified,
    SecurityGroups,
    DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    CreatedBy,
    CreatedByLink,
    CreatedByName,
    DateEntered,
    Deleted,
    Description,
    ModifiedByName,
    ModifiedUserID,
    ModifiedUserLink,
    DPIAPriority,
    DPIAResolution,
    DPIAType,
    WorkLog,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_dpia_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim AS Target
USING ims_dpia_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSDPIAID = Target.IMSDPIAID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSDPIAID,
        DPIAIDLegacy,
        DPIAIDCoded,
        DPIAName,
        DPIAAssignedUserID,
        DPIAAssignedUserName,
        IMSDPIANumber,
        DPIAPM,
        DPIAContractOwner,
        DPIAOrganisationAreas,
        DPIALinkDraft,
        DPIADateRegistered,
        DPIADateToMHCLG,
        DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
        DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
        DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
        DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
        DPIADateCompleted,
        DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
        DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
        DPIAReviewPeriod,
        DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
        DPIANumberContainer,
        DPIAHelp,
        DPIADateToSDPM,
        DPIAResidualRisks,
        DPIADisagreement,
        IODecisionOutcome,
        IOScreeningOutcome,
        DPIAIMSINtegration,
        DPIADocumentID,
        DPIAControlledDocument,
        DPIADateNextReview,
        DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
        DPIAUserID,
        DPIAInformationOwner,
        DPIAUser1ID,
        DPIAInformationOwner1,
        DPIAStatus,
        DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
        DPIADateModified,
        SecurityGroups,
        DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
        CreatedBy,
        CreatedByLink,
        CreatedByName,
        DateEntered,
        Deleted,
        Description,
        ModifiedByName,
        ModifiedUserID,
        ModifiedUserLink,
        DPIAPriority,
        DPIAResolution,
        DPIAType,
        WorkLog,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSDPIAID,
        Source.DPIAIDLegacy	,
        Source.DPIAIDCoded	,
        Source.DPIAName	,
        Source.DPIAAssignedUserID	,
        Source.DPIAAssignedUserName	,
        Source.IMSDPIANumber	,
        Source.DPIAPM	,
        Source.DPIAContractOwner	,
        Source.DPIAOrganisationAreas	,
        Source.DPIALinkDraft	,
        Source.DPIADateRegistered	,
        Source.DPIADateToMHCLG	,
        Source.DPIADateToWelshGovernment	,
        Source.DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG	,
        Source.DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment	,
        Source.DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm	,
        Source.DPIADateCompleted	,
        Source.DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk	,
        Source.DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk	,
        Source.DPIAReviewPeriod	,
        Source.DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate	,
        Source.DPIANumberContainer	,
        Source.DPIAHelp	,
        Source.DPIADateToSDPM	,
        Source.DPIAResidualRisks	,
        Source.DPIADisagreement	,
        Source.IODecisionOutcome	,
        Source.IOScreeningOutcome	,
        Source.DPIAIMSINtegration	,
        Source.DPIADocumentID	,
        Source.DPIAControlledDocument	,
        Source.DPIADateNextReview	,
        Source.DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication	,
        Source.DPIAUserID	,
        Source.DPIAInformationOwner	,
        Source.DPIAUser1ID	,
        Source.DPIAInformationOwner1	,
        Source.DPIAStatus	,
        Source.DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation	,
        Source.DPIADateModified	,
        Source.SecurityGroups	,
        Source.DPIAAssignedUSerLink	,
        Source.CreatedBy	,
        Source.CreatedByLink	,
        Source.CreatedByName	,
        Source.DateEntered	,
        Source.Deleted	,
        Source.Description	,
        Source.ModifiedByName	,
        Source.ModifiedUserID	,
        Source.ModifiedUserLink	,
        Source.DPIAPriority	,
        Source.DPIAResolution	,
        Source.DPIAType	,
        Source.WorkLog	,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_dpia_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSDPIAID NULLS LAST) AS IMSDPIAID,
    DPIAIDLegacy,
    DPIAIDCoded,
    DPIAName,
    DPIAAssignedUserID,
    DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IMSDPIANumber,
    DPIAPM,
    DPIAContractOwner,
    DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    DPIALinkDraft,
    DPIADateRegistered,
    DPIADateToMHCLG,
    DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    DPIADateCompleted,
    DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    DPIAReviewPeriod,
    DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    DPIANumberContainer,
    DPIAHelp,
    DPIADateToSDPM,
    DPIAResidualRisks,
    DPIADisagreement,
    IODecisionOutcome,
    IOScreeningOutcome,
    DPIAIMSINtegration,
    DPIADocumentID,
    DPIAControlledDocument,
    DPIADateNextReview,
    DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    DPIAUserID,
    DPIAInformationOwner,
    DPIAUser1ID,
    DPIAInformationOwner1,
    DPIAStatus,
    DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    DPIADateModified,
    SecurityGroups,
    DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    CreatedBy,
    CreatedByLink,
    CreatedByName,
    DateEntered,
    Deleted,
    Description,
    ModifiedByName,
    ModifiedUserID,
    ModifiedUserLink,
    DPIAPriority,
    DPIAResolution,
    DPIAType,
    WorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim ;
